pageTitle: Stir-Fried Chicken with Water Chestnuts, Red Cabbage and Angelino Plums - Chi Running
textBeforeTable: Stir-Fried Chicken with Water Chestnuts, Red Cabbage and Angelino Plums Recipes /   Stir-Fried Chicken with Water Chestnuts, Red Cabbage and Angelino Plums Resources /   Home /   LinkedIn Pinterest YouTube Facebook Twitter eMail View Cart ChiLiving
textAfterTable: Directions Using the bare minimum of the coconut and sesame or olive oil needed to cook without burning, stir everything together over medium-high heat in a large saucepan or a wok, until the chicken is cooked and the cabbage is tender. Serve warm, garnished with white or black sesame seeds. *Dried apricots can also be substituted for plums for a close second in flavor!   (Serves 4) Recipe provided by the Clean Program Store What is ChiRunning?
